unnormalised: Hõ, thãw do 123, Linking Rd, Bandra West, Mumbai, MH 400050 re menãk-a, onko naamkora chaha dokan seten, bãdãe-yãm-a? 15/08 dhãbi jãwãb em!
normalised:
Hẽ, thã̃w do mit sae gel pe, Linking Road, Bandra Paschim, Mumbai, M.H. car lak pachaas, uni mashoor ca-dukan seta-re menaka, baḍae-pe?
R.S.V.P. Augus gel pe tarikh bhitre!
text: Hõ, thãw do 123, Linking Rd, Bandra West, Mumbai, MH 400050 re menãk-a, onko naamkora chaha dokan seten, bãdãe-yãm-a? 15/08 dhãbi jãwãb em!
